name: Mother's Home
description:
Help the imaginative kid fight the dinosaur, eat the cookies and open the mysterious chest! Walk through the maze without wandering away from your mother for too long. You have to help the kid by finding the correct tools in its adventure. Don’t worry, for your attentious mother won’t leave you alone if she knows you are scared. You can always call out to her if you start crying.

Developed at Global Game Jam 2019, in which the theme was "What home means to you”.
